reviewText: This was purchased as a gift, as far as I know, it is just fine.
Title: Grace Quigley VHS

reviewText: I have loved this movie for years and have had a very hard time trying to find it so I was thrilled when I saw it here.  It is everything I hoped it would be and was delighted with the company and quality of the VHS.
Title: Grace Quigley VHS

reviewText: I would have liked it if I could have purchased this on DVD. I was only able to find it second hand on VHS which we all know is not the clearer picture that DVD or better yet Blue Ray. but the movie it self is still just as funny as when I saw it the first time.Elderly woman in dispare wittnesses her landlords demise by a hit man and decides to hire the hitman to take her out. She can't afford the hit mans price and so gets an elderly man to pay double the amount for the same deal.....well Grace Quigley ends up teaming up with the hitman. She sets up hits on her elderly friends who are ready to depart this life. Many mishaps take place and the funnies begin.I love this movie,very funny...
Title: Grace Quigley VHS

reviewText: A great movie...funny storyline with quality acting...a hitman who wants to retire due to nervous conditions meets a little old lady who wants to put him to work...just wish this would be released on DVD...
Title: Grace Quigley VHS

reviewText: Hepburn and Nolte are great together.  It's offbeat, highly improbably but not entirely impossible.  You don't have to think, just enjoy.
Title: Grace Quigley VHS
